item.title: Revitalizing Ping ISI BeCu Irons
item.description: It took me seventeen years to get three thousand hits in baseball. I did it in one afternoon on the golf course. – Hank Aaron eBay Find Iâ€™m a sucker for classic Ping clubs and found these ISIs on eBay. Most interesting to me was that the clubs were: beryllium copper and appeared to be in great shape. Beryllium copper (BeCu) became popular back in the mid/late ’80s principally because it was advertised as offering a softer feel than many of the equivalent cast steel designs of the time.
